attachments.title: shirou/gopsutil
attachments.text: psutil for golang. Contribute to shirou/gopsutil development by creating an account on GitHub.

text:
MacをCatalinaに上げたら、C系が動かなくて gopsutil 試せない
ツライ
Macって毎回アップデートするとC周りが死ぬ

attachments.fallback: Stack Overflow: Can't compile a C program on a Mac after upgrading to Catalina 10.15
attachments.title: Can't compile a C program on a Mac after upgrading to Catalina 10.15
attachments.text: There's a previous question Can't compile C program on a Mac after upgrade to Mojave, and the answers to that have covered most of the variations on what goes wrong. Now — as of Monday 2019-10-07 ...

text:
あ、mac は大体の関数が CGo に依存してるんですね...
ちゃんと見てなかった
今実装見たら、Macはpsコマンドをパースしていますね
プロセス情報はCGoを使っているっぽい
んー、C系エラーだらけだな。。

`go vet` やったら大量なエラーが出て、ナニモワカラナイ状態

```
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/stdlib.h|134 col 25| warning: pointer is missing a nullability type specifier (_Nonnull, _Nullable, or _Null_unspecified) [-Wnullability-completeness]
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/stdlib.h|134 col 25| note: insert '_Nullable' if the pointer may be null
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/stdlib.h|134 col 25| note: insert '_Nonnull' if the pointer should never be null
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/stdlib.h|135 col 22| warning: pointer is missing a nullability type specifier (_Nonnull, _Nullable, or _Null_unspecified) [-Wnullability-completeness]
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/stdlib.h|135 col 22| note: insert '_Nullable' if the pointer may be null
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/stdlib.h|135 col 22| note: insert '_Nonnull' if the pointer should never be null
```
